instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: macbook pro A 1398
threads.message: Hi...I'm from indonesia .. and i want to ask macbook pro retina A1398 that magsave green than orange light on. but the logic board still dead. please give me the tutorial to check one by one .  thank u very much

threads.title: macbook pro A 1398
threads.message:
subscribe and watch all his videos [url]https://www.youtube.com/user/rossmanngroup[/url]

check whats the voltage on PPBUS_G3H and check the board for corrosion.

threads.title: macbook pro A 1398
threads.message: Are you using a REAL 85W charger?? No Chinese fake garbage, these machines will not power on from a 60W or some Chinese garbage chargers.
